candidates.title: backend: enable some smallvec features
candidates.body: Since wayland-rs depends on 1.53, union, const_generics and const_new may be enabled.

candidates.title: backend: ensure all features are built on docs.rs
client: add EventQueue::poll_dispatch
candidates.body: This makes it simpler to use multiple event queues with an async runtime for dispatching.

candidates.title: backend/client: rework API with internal locking in backend
candidates.body: This is the result of a discussion on the matrix chatroom about how the previous API was unfriendly to destructors (as the connection handle could not be made available in those contexts).

candidates.title: server: remove type parameter from DisplayHandle
backend: ensure client and server types implement same traits
protocols: update to 1.21
candidates.body:
Updates wayland-protocols to 1.21.

This also adds a module and feature to enable `staging` modules.

chosen_pr.title: backend: enable some smallvec features
chosen_pr.body: Since wayland-rs depends on 1.53, union, const_generics and const_new may be enabled.

chosen_detail.title: backend: enable some smallvec features
chosen_detail.body: Since wayland-rs depends on 1.53, union, const_generics and const_new may be enabled.

repo.name: wayland-rs
repo.description: Rust implementation of the wayland protocol (client and server).
